results.title: Unsuccessful Treatment of Alopecia Areata with Simvastatin/Ezetimibe: Experience in 12 Patients.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Prospective observational study of the efficacy and tolerability of @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin/ezetimibe@@@ 40/10 mg (Inegy; MSD Merck Sharp & Dohme AG, Lucerne, Switzerland) over a treatment period of 6 months in @DISEASE_Alopecia @DISEASE_MESH:D000505 @@@alopecia totalis@@@, @DISEASE_Alopecia_universalis @DISEASE_MESH:C537055 @@@universalis@@@, multipatch involvement @DISEASE_Ectodermal_Dysplasia @DISEASE_MESH:D004476 @@@of the scalp@@@ >30%, @<m>DISEASE_Keratosis_Follicularis_Spinulosa_Decalvans_X_Linked</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536159 @@@ophiasis@@@, or diffuse @DISEASE_Alopecia_Areata @DISEASE_MESH:D000506 @@@alopecia areata@@@.

citations.NLM: Freitas Gouveia M, Trüeb RM. Unsuccessful Treatment of Alopecia Areata with Simvastatin/Ezetimibe: Experience in 12 Patients. Skin Appendage Disord. 2017 Aug;3(3):156-160. PMID: 28879192
